short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BugShot is an easy-to-use tool to track the bugs on your projects.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The concept is a breeze.
 üìç  Mark a bug on the projects website
üìù Add some info
üéâ Hit "Report" and you are done

The bug will now automatically get stored within the Kanban board of the project in the BugShot webpanel containing the screenshot and all the important info a developer needs to fix it.

The BugShot browser extension enhances the user bug-tracking experience by giving them a sidebar with tools to use for reporting and viewing bugs directly on the project website.
